post.title: Customer Service- Contractor Support Rep.
post.content:
Position Overview:

Contractor Support is a client-oriented telephone service group within EnerBank that is primarily responsible for serving some of the bank’s most important customers: contractors and program sponsors.  The Contractor Support Representative understands this important responsibility and as a result, must meet performance standards established for each. The representative must:  project a smile in their voice; be excited to serve and help the contractor or sponsor; be confident; have an excellent attention to detail in all responsibilities; and meet defined productivity requirements. As a general statement, the representative provides outstanding inbound and outbound telephone support to contractors and program sponsors in connection to their loan activity with the bank.

Responsibilities:

  • Provide inbound and outbound telephone support to contractors and program sponsors
  • Explain processes and procedures of using the bank’s loan programs
  • Provide credit decisions, status updates, and other information regarding specific applicants
  • Advise contractors of the next steps on applications
  • Update and send applications to other departments
  • Refer or transfer contractors and program sponsors to various parties within and outside the bank
  • Document interactions with contractors and program sponsors
  • Provide user support for various websites
  • Troubleshoot basic issues such as user error, unlock accounts, password resets, and send email notifications
  • Walk contractors and program sponsors through online processes
  • Resolve contractor invoice issues
  • Miscellaneous projects or tasks as assigned
  • Meet required production levels while maintaining excellent quality

Qualifications:

  • Extremely detail-oriented
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills
  • Customer service experience or orientation
  • Must have a desire and ability to serve and help others
  • Must be dependable
  • Ability to remain calm and focused during stressful conversations
  • Ability to multi-task
  • Ability and desire to work in a fast paced and performance driven work environment
  • Ability to convey a smile in their voice during all telephone conversations
  • Ability to quickly learn and become proficient in using software programs and other company systems

Work Hours:

Contractor Support is open seven days per week.  However, most positions are Monday through Friday with occasional Saturday or Sunday shifts. Actual work schedule can be flexible to accommodate a student schedule as long as the work schedule meets the bank’s staffing needs.  We are looking to fill the 11:30 am to 8 pm shift.
